text: so much the other make it not me it
doesn't matter what currency you use
what matters is that you have money to
survive it doesn't matter whether it's
called drachma or whether it's called
euro it's all the same when you don't
have it my works are you tipsy walls I
will vote no and I believe that's what
all great people will do we will lose a
lot of Rights I know that but I'm trying
to do it for the future of my children I
don't want my children and my
grandchildren to have to pay for these
billions and trillions we really have to
vote no and I hope something will change
in Greece at those who have signed our
downfall because of them tsipras can't
figure things out and then we have those
from above deceiving us let's say no to
these gangsters let us all die with
dignity no more enough is enough
